## BPD\_MINIMUM\_DEBT variable

A Vault must always have at least this much debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
BPD_MINIMUM_DEBT: Decimal
```

## Remarks

Any transaction that would result in a Vault with less debt than this will be reverted.
